GetProfileMetricsRequestContent.description:
Contains the profile identifier to get metrics for, the metric start and end dates, and the type of aggregation period for metrics.
AggregateType can be either DAY or WEEK. For example, to get total metrics for a profile for the past 90 days, aggregated by week, you would input
the start date as 90 days ago, end date as today, and aggregate type WEEK. Maximum days between start and end date is 365 days. If no dates are
provided, the last 30 days of data will be returned.

PostStatus.description:
Status of Post:
 * DRAFT - Post is in DRAFT state.
 * REVIEW                - Post is in Review.
 * LIVE - Post is live and available for Amazon Shoppers.
                * REJECTED - Post is Rejected. The detail of rejection is available in StatusMetadata.
                * WITHDRAWN - Post is Withdrawn from live.
 * SCHEDULED - Post is scheduled                to go live.
